name: Fantasy Strike
description: A fighting game designed from the ground up to be so easy to control that even non-fighting game players can play it, yet deep enough to play in tournaments. Vibrant graphics and excellent online play.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-4302Y @ 1.6GHz, Celeron G1840 @ 2.8 GHz / AMD Athlon II X3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 555M, 9800 GTX / Radeon R7, HD 8500 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: -
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-5200U @ 2.20GHz, Celeron G3920 @ 2.90GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 645 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960, Radeon R9 280X DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: -
